00022 #include "dfsch/lib/regex.h"
00023 
00024 typedef struct dfsch_regex_t {
00025   dfsch_type_t *type;
00026   regex_t regex;
00027   int sub_count;
00028 } dfsch_regex_t;
00029 
00030 static dfsch_type_t regex_type = {
00031   DFSCH_STANDARD_TYPE,
00032   NULL,
00033   sizeof(dfsch_regex_t),
00034   "regex",
00035   NULL, // equal?
00036   NULL, // write
00037   NULL, // apply
00038 };
00039 
00040 static void regex_finalizer(dfsch_regex_t* regex, void* cd){
00041   regfree(&(regex->regex));
00042 }
00043 
00044 char* regex_get_error(int errcode, const regex_t *preg){
00045   size_t len;
00046   char* buf;
00047   len = regerror(errcode, preg, NULL, 0);
00048   buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len);
00049   regerror(errcode, preg, buf, len);
00050   return buf;
00051 }
00052 
00053 static int get_sub_count(char* expression, int flags){
00054   int escape;
00055   int r;
00056   escape = 0;
00057   r = 0;
00058   while (*expression){
00059     switch (*expression){
00060     case '\\':
00061       escape = 1;
00062       break;
00063     case '(':
00064       if ((flags & REG_EXTENDED) == REG_EXTENDED || escape){
00065         r++;
00066       }
00067     default:
00068       escape = 0;
00069     }
00070     expression++;
00071   }
00072   return r+1;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static void regex_compile(regex_t* regex, char* expression, int flags){
00076   int err;
00077 
00078   err = regcomp(regex, expression, flags);
00079   if (err != 0){
00080     dfsch_error("regex:error", 
00081                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(regex_get_error(err, regex)));
00082   }
00083 }
00084 
00085 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_regex_compile(char* expression, int flags){
00086   dfsch_regex_t* r = (dfsch_regex_t*)dfsch_make_object(&regex_type);
00087   
00088   regex_compile(&(r->regex), expression, flags);
00089 
00090   if ((flags & REG_NOSUB) == REG_NOSUB){
00091     r->sub_count = 0;
00092   }else{
00093     r->sub_count = get_sub_count(expression, flags);
00094   }
00095   GC_REGISTER_FINALIZER(r, (GC_finalization_proc)regex_finalizer,
00096                         NULL, NULL, NULL);
00097 
00098 
00099   return (dfsch_object_t*)r;
00100 }
00101 
00102 static int regex_match(regex_t* regex, char*string, int flags){
00103   return (regexec(regex, string, 0, NULL, flags) == 0);
00104 }
00105 
00106 int dfsch_regex_match_p(dfsch_object_t* regex, char* string, int flags){
00107   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(regex) != &regex_type)
00108     dfsch_error("regex:not-a-regex", regex);
00109 
00110   return regex_match(&(((dfsch_regex_t*)regex)->regex), string, flags);
00111 }
00112 
00113 static dfsch_object_t* regex_substrings(regex_t* regex, char* string, 
00114                                         int sub_count, int flags){
00115   regmatch_t *match;
00116   int i;
00117   int count;
00118   dfsch_object_t* vector;
00119 
00120   match = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(sizeof(regmatch_t)*sub_count);
00121 
00122   if (regexec(regex, string, sub_count, match, flags) == REG_NOMATCH){
00123     GC_FREE(match);
00124     return NULL;
00125   }
00126 
00127   count = 0;
00128 
00129   for (i = 0; i < sub_count; i++){
00130     if (match[i].rm_so == -1)  // No more substring matches
00131       break;
00132     count ++;
00133   }
00134 
00135 
00136   vector = dfsch_make_vector(count, NULL);
00137   
00138   for (i = 0; i < count; i++){
00139     dfsch_vector_set(vector, i, 
00140                      dfsch_vector(3,
00141                                   dfsch_make_number_from_long(match[i].rm_so),
00142                                   dfsch_make_number_from_long(match[i].rm_eo),
00143                                   dfsch_make_string_buf(string+match[i].rm_so,
00144                                                         match[i].rm_eo-match[i].rm_so)));
00145   } 
00146 
00147   GC_FREE(match);
00148     
00149   return vector;
00150 }
00151 
00152 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_regex_substrings(dfsch_object_t* regex, char* string,
00153                                        int flags){
00154   dfsch_regex_t* r;
00155   if (DFSCH_TYPE_OF(regex) != &regex_type)
00156     dfsch_error("regex:not-a-regex", regex);
00157   r = (dfsch_regex_t*)regex;
00158   if (r->sub_count == 0)
00159     dfsch_error("regex:compiled-with-nosub", regex);
00160 
00161   return regex_substrings(&(r->regex), string, r->sub_count, flags);
00162 }
00163 
00164 int dfsch_regex_match_once_p(char* expression, 
00165                              int cflags, int mflags, 
00166                              char* string){
00167   regex_t regex;
00168   int r;
00169 
00170   regex_compile(&regex, expression, cflags);
00171   r = regex_match(&regex, string, mflags);
00172   regfree(&regex);
00173 
00174   return r;
00175 }
00176 
00177 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_regex_substrings_once(char* expression, 
00178                                             int cflags, int mflags, 
00179                                             char* string){
00180   regex_t regex;
00181   dfsch_object_t* r;
00182 
00183   regex_compile(&regex, expression, cflags);
00184   r = regex_substrings(&regex, string, 
00185                        get_sub_count(expression, cflags),
00186                        mflags);
00187 
00188   regfree(&regex);
00189 
00190   return r;
00191 }
